properties.description: We'd love to attract more guests, as we know plenty of people are being hit hard by the cost-of-living crisis. So please do spread the word - and pop along yourself for a cuppa, a light lunch, a chat with our friendly volunteers, crafts, jigsaws and more! Having you there really helps to create a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
